channel.title: epilot API Changelog
channel.description: Breaking changes, new features, and significant updates to epilot APIs.

item.title: 2026-02-22 Entity API
item.description: - New table schema attribute type was added

item.title: 2026-02-20 ERP Integration API
item.description: - Integration create/update/get response schemas restructured — fields now composed via allOf[IntegrationEditableFields]; SDK consumers should regenerate types

item.title: 2026-02-20 Core Events
item.description: - New TariffChange event was introduced

item.title: 2026-02-19 ERP Integration API
item.description: - New file_proxy use case type was added — FileProxyUseCase is now a valid variant alongside InboundUseCase/OutboundUseCase

item.title: 2026-02-19 Webhooks API
item.description: - New filterConditions field was added to webhook configs, allowing event delivery to be filtered by conditions

item.title: 2026-02-18 Customer Portal API
item.description: - New EntitySlugConfig support was added to entity search — accepts per-slug configuration objects with slug, targets, and templates

item.title: 2026-02-18 Workflows Definition API
item.description: - assigned_to field type changed from plain string to oneOf[string, VariableAssignment] — unlocks dynamic variable-based assignment

item.title: 2026-02-18 Metering API
item.description: - POST /v2/metering/readings request now uses a discriminated union on the operation field (CreateOrUpdateBatchReading or DeleteBatchReading)

item.title: 2026-02-13 Workflows Definition API
item.description: - New additional_triggers field was added to flow templates, enabling multiple trigger configurations per flow

item.title: 2026-02-12 ERP Integration API
item.description: - New POST /v1/integrations//monitoring/timeseries endpoint was added for querying time-series event counts

item.title: 2026-02-11 ERP Integration API
item.description: - POST /v1/erp/updates/events (v1) and POST /v2/erp/updates/events (v2) are now deprecated — migrate to POST /v3/erp/updates/events

item.title: 2026-02-11 Webhooks API
item.description: - GET /v1/webhooks/.well-known/public-key endpoint was reactivated with a new required orgId query parameter

item.title: 2026-02-10 ERP Integration API
item.description: - New POST /v3/erp/updates/events endpoint was added — v3 event processing using integration-based authentication

item.title: 2026-02-10 Webhooks API
item.description: - New signingSecret field was added to webhook config responses (returned once at creation time)

item.title: 2026-02-09 Email Settings API
item.description: - New GET /v2/outlook/connection:resolve endpoint was added to look up an Outlook connection by email address

item.title: 2026-02-06 Entity API
item.description: - Breaking: POST /v1/entity/taxonomies//classifications — deleted response type changed from object to array

item.title: 2026-02-06 Customer Portal API
item.description: - New GET /v2/portal/entity//{id}/workflows endpoint was added

item.title: 2026-02-06 Order Entity
item.description: - New coupons relation was added

item.title: 2026-02-05 Pricing API
item.description: - New coupons field was added to order responses

item.title: 2026-02-05 Automation API
item.description: - New NewEmailThreadTrigger trigger type was added to automation flows

item.title: 2026-02-05 Query API
item.description: - New GET /v2/query/semantic-model endpoint was added, returning available entity tables, relationships, and query capabilities

item.title: 2026-02-05 Contract Entity
item.description: - New assets relation was added

item.title: 2026-02-05 Order Entity
item.description: - New opportunities and contracts relations were added

item.description: - New exclude query parameter was added to GET /v1/entity/schemas for excluding schemas by slug

item.description: - New PUT /v2/portal/notifications/entity:status endpoint was added for batch-updating notification status

item.description: - New NONE auth type was added, allowing webhook endpoints using standard signature auth only

item.description: - New OnDemandSyncContractRequested event was introduced
